snippet: Rafael Nadal has won 247 of 266 career matches on clay with his powerful legs and a forehand that produces dizzying spin, making him possibly the best clay-court player ever.
abstract: Rafael Nadal has won 247 of 266 career matches on clay with his powerful legs and a forehand that produces dizzying spin, making him possibly the best clay-court player in history of tennis; has captured 35 championships on clay, including six at the French Open.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal has won 247 of 266 career matches on clay with his powerful legs and a forehand that produces dizzying spin, making him possibly the best clay-court player ever.

headline.seo: French Open: Nadal Builds Clay-Court Edge With Spin and Mobility
headline.main: Molded for Success on Clay Courts
